title: News
latestOnAirPollutionText: We curate relevant Mongolian and English articles, in addition to writing original pieces about air pollution in Mongolia and worldwide . If you have suggestions, contact hello@breathemongolia.org
agaarNegPlatform: Agaar Neg platfrom by Breathe Mongolia
bannerText: Stay up-to-date with the latest on air pollution and related topics in Mongolia and worldwide
